Hand colored slide. Post-mortem photograph of the author Henrik Ibsen, photographed on 23 May 1906. In the book "Norwegian landscape and Norwegian men" tells Wilse: "When Ibsen died in the spring, sent from Bergliot Ibsen summoned to, and so I also got to photograph the poet on his deathbed. He was dead at night in his apartment in Arbiens street, and when I arrived, it was around noon. though it was not so long ago he passed away, it was difficult to know his moves again. "
